Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/54th
ShortDescription: 94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 55th, Kedzie, 51st, then resume their normal route on California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 55th, Kedzie, 51st, then resume their normal route on California.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near California/54th.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Lake
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near the area of Lake. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near the area of Lake. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
